title: Getting real tired of crashing at champ select in ranked
body: Ive had enough of this, ive lost at least 100 lp through crashing in champ select and it happens twice a day. This has been going on for months now how come it hasnt been fixed im tired of waiting in penalty queues and losing shit tons of lp also it happens to alot of my friends. PLEASE RIOT PLEASE FIX CHAMP SELECT IN RANKED CRASHES ARE TOO FREQUENT IS SUPER AGGRAVATING

replies.body: When you say crash, are you getting any errors and what does it say?  Are you doing anything when it occurs, like adjusting your masteries?  Is it actually during champion select or after once the game loads?I highly recommend we do some troubleshooting asap and in custom games to prevent more dodges like this!  Let me know!
It says Lolclient.exe crashed during champion select usually during the ban phase and it happens after i pick my preferred champion.

> [{quoted}](name=ToxicHaxx,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=bKAM2TOO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-13T23:04:44.008+0000)
>
> It says Lolclient.exe crashed during champion select usually during the ban phase and it happens after i pick my preferred champion.

This has been happening to me and my friends as well. Not sure what's causing it. Might be related to a ton of memory usage from the client. It's also a huge problem that when the client crashes after you pick your champ, but the game will still go through as normal. It will say [x] person has left the room, but they're not going to be able to change summs or masteries at that point. This doesn't happen to me daily, but a couple times a week it happens to someone on my team.

It usually happens to me and my friends in champ select during the banning phase as well. In addtion sometimes the whole set up will just disappear as in all the buttons, everyones names and such it's pretty bizzare.
Im sitting at an HOUR ban......

Logged in to up vote this post. I tilted because of this: Lost a 4 v 5 game (teammate afk)- was winning before afk. left with 3 lp. client lags in Champ select and I can't ban. Literally lags to the point where clicking does nothing. looses that 3 lp because apparently i "dodged". Then i disconnect as the game starts. I assume there is a wifi problem and turn on 4G Data hotspot on phone but the new client refuses to reconnect. Waited a whole minute. Then closed client and restarted and client is a pitch black screen. Had to find a thread that helped me delete some files in the RAD folder under the League of Legends folder. I ofcourse didn't make it in time and I was marked to have left my game. Got demoted loosing 25lp. I'm like dang... what is this game

I have never had this problem until recently.  It has happened twice to me in the past few days and also to my duo friend.  Champ select was working before, something must have broke. 

I don't know how hard this would be to implement, but  It would nice if the game gave you a small timer to get logged back into champ select before immediately disbanding and giving a penalty.
Its happened to me quite a few times and its quite annoying, i also have crashes when i switch between the shop and the loot and crafting inventory tab.

Happens to me frequently. Thankfully, I don't really play ranked anymore so I don't have to worry about points, but I do end up getting placed into 20 minute penalty queues because of (auto?) reports for "afk". Its really frustrating, to say the least.

The only response I got from Riot was that its because I play via WiFi...
yeah, love losing 9-12 lp a day plus getting timer....
